DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Precision Microperimetry Function Spectral OCT/SLO
DOC.criteria: Subject must 21 year age old . Subjects recruit Cohort 1 know retinal disease except refractive error ( 7.5 D +7.5 diopter ) .Subjects recruit Cohort 2 one follow retinal pathology : early intermediate AgeRelated Macular Degeneration , Geographic Atrophy , Diabetic Retinopathy ( mild , moderate , severe ) , Macular Edema secondary Diabetes , Retinal Vein Occlusion , Central Serous Retinopathy , Pattern Dystrophy , Epiretinal Membrane Macular Hole . Subjects sign informed consent form . Subjects comply protocol . Subjects young 21 year age . Subjects comply protocol . Subjects complete Simple Test procedures Subjects available test 3 time day ( Morning , Mid Day , Afternoon ) . Subjects visual acuity bad 20/100 ( Best Corrected ) . Subjects dense medium opacity . Ocular surgery anticipate day study visit .
